"wune kiyanne lokuhamuduruwane,wadayata kiyala awith asungaththa witharayi,mage me kana aha pennala angilla dikkare nathayi ara unnanse.aaganthuka hamuduruwo wechchi,arath ithin obawanse mata nitharama kiyanawane kenthiya palanaya karaganna kiyala.ee hinda mama bohoma suhada widihata angili deka dikkarala pennuwa obawahanse wasanawanthayi as dekama thiyena nisa kiyala.ee gamana ee unnanse ma dihata angili thunak dikkala nowa ohege thani ahayi, mage as dekayi as thunayi kiyala.ane ammapa mata aapu kenthiyata mama unnansege munatama dekak damala aninna kiyala giya,eeth mita molopu atha unnansege muna langatama aawama aayith eeken obawahanseta wena apahase therum giya nisa yantham aayi atha gaththa" kiyala samanera hamuduruwo eka husmata kiyagena giya.
